org.webcurator.core.agency
Interface AgencyUserManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AgencyUserManagerImpl
public interface AgencyUserManager

Provides the mechanism for accessing user, role and agency data.

Author:
bprice

void updateAgency(Agency agency,
                  boolean update)
persists the agency into the database

Parameters:
agency - the Agency domain object to persist
update - set this to true if the agency should be updated. Set this to false if this is anew Agency

updateUser

void updateUser(User user,
                boolean update)
creates or updates a User object in the database

Parameters:
user - the User object
update - true if this is an update action rather than a create action

modifyUserStatus

void modifyUserStatus(User user)
allows the users active/inactive flag to be altered and the action to be audited. If the user passed to the method is currently active, the user will be made inactive. If the user passed to the method is inactive, the user will be made active.

Parameters:
user - the User object to operate on

deleteUser

void deleteUser(User user)
deletes the User object and its role associations

Parameters:
user - the fully populated user object for deletion

updateRole

void updateRole(Role role,
                boolean update)
Creates or updates a Role

Parameters:
role - the Role object to persist
update - true if the action is an update, false if the action is a create

deleteRole

void deleteRole(Role role)
Deletes a Role from the System

Parameters:
role - the Role object to remove

updateUserRoles

void updateUserRoles(User user)
Takes a populated User object and updates all the associated Roles of the user.

Parameters:
user - the fully populated user with the new role associations defined
